崶字的基本解释

崶
fēng
〔三崶寺〕地名，在中国湖南省。

崶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēng］
［《廣韻》府容切，平鍾，非。］
(1)山名。一名龙门山，在广东省。
(2)地名用字。

崶字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　崶； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页315第26
【廣韻】府容切【集韻】方容切，?音封。【廣韻】山名。一名龍門山，在封州。大魚上化爲龍，上不得，點額血流，水爲丹色也。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēng］
["Guangyun" Fu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Fei. ]
(1) The name of the mountain. A Longmen Mountain in Guangdong Province.
(2) Words used in place names.
崶
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　崶; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 315 and 26
[Guangyun] Fu Rongqie [Jiyun] Fang Rongqie, with sound seal. [Guangyun] The name of the mountain. A Longmen Mountain in Fengzhou. The big fish turned into a dragon and couldn't go up. The blood flowed from the forehead, and the water became a red color.
